Text:
Hahaha - I notice those skivver_v (or whoever the fuck) posts with the bundled torrents bullshit have been removed.

Thanks for coming back VTV the scammers were starting to move in your absence.
Yes the bundled torrents were annoying, but the files were still good.  Im glad someone stepped up since I hates ta miss my Stewart and Colbert, but its good to have VTV back on top.
